title: Stackoverflow-focus: a chrome extension to clean up Stack Overflow
author: bfe
content: readme.md // -minute hack promote focus stackoverflow// e.g. remove mostly ridiculous -called 'hot network questions'// v0.0.1 does block ad job panel// inspired twitteropt/main.js via andrej karpathy// https://karpathy.github.io/2013/11/23/chrome-extension-programming/super hacky i already love fork ak's instructions:place folder anywhere your system, go tools / extensions chrome sure developer mode (top right) is checkedclick button "load unpacked extension..." ( top)navigate stackopt folder open . extension gets added!reopen stackoverflow tab, 're to !blog post ak's twitter extension:http://karpathy.ca/myblog/2013/11/23/chrome-extension-programming-illustrating--basic-survival-skill--a-twitter-case-study/
